sn45.176:1.1: “Mendicants, there are these five kinds of sensual stimulation.
sn45.176:1.3: Sights known by the eye that are likable, desirable, agreeable, pleasant, sensual, and arousing.
sn45.176:1.4: Sounds known by the ear … Smells known by the nose …
sn45.176:1.6: Touches known by the body that are likable, desirable, agreeable, pleasant, sensual, and arousing.
sn45.176:1.7: These are the five kinds of sensual stimulation.
sn45.176:1.8: The noble eightfold path should be developed for the direct knowledge, complete understanding, finishing, and giving up of these five kinds of sensual stimulation.”
